DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a bed height make an effect to endotracheal intubation with Macintosh laryngoscope, Glidescope and Airwayscope during chest compressions in- hospital simulation cardiac arrest.
DOC.brief_title: Endotracheal Intubation Using Macintosh Laryngoscope, Glidescope, Airwayscope During Chest Compression With Adjustment Height of a Bed
DOC.criteria: Experience of Intubation > 50 times Postgraduates year 1,2,3,4 and Emergency physicians in emergency department Wrist or low back disease
